facts.1-description-1: Progressing through season 1 gives vou extra rewards.
facts.2-description-1: You can play 4 games of Jokers per day instead of 2.
facts.2-description-2: Every game recovers every 4 hours intead of 12.
facts.3-description-1: 20% discount on every Season 1 pack you buy.

packs.purchase-error-no-account: We couldn't find your account. Please try logging out and back in.
packs.purchase-error-description: We couldn't complete your pack purchase. Please try again.
packs.purchase-error-no-package: We couldn't complete your pack purchase. Configuration problem.
packs.transferrable-legend: All items in purchased packs are transferrable.
packs.skins-legend: Player packs do not contain skinned cards.

description.1: Upgrade your collection with higher odds of rare cards.
description.2: Up to 50% chance to pull a Special card.

description.1: A premium pack with a strong chance of hitting Specials.
description.2: Up to 75% chance to get a Special card, includes A and S tiers.

description.1: Guaranteed Special card in every pack.
description.2: Highest odds for A and S tier Specials, truly legendary rewards.

description.1: Limited-edition pack featuring ultra-rare cards and skins.
description.2: 1 guaranteed skinned Special card with top-tier odds.

description.1: Massive pack loaded with the rarest content of the season.
description.2: 2 guaranteed skinned Special cards with top-tier odds.

mobile-blocker.please-download-the-app-to-continue: Please download the app to continue

my-games.title: Games

confirmation-modal.title: Surrender
confirmation-modal.description: Are you sure you want to surrender the game #{{gameId}}? There is no way to undo this action.

my-games.no-games: You don't have any games. Start a new one!

create-game.stage-5: The game is about to begin...

game-over.current-position: You are in position number {{position}}, do you want to keep it?

table.gameOver-leader-msj: Congratulations! You're the top player on the leaderboard!
table.gameOver-top5-msj: Great job! You're in the top 5! Keep it up!

error-labels.error-shortUsername-login: Username must be at least 3 characters
error-labels.error-longUsername-login: Username must be at most 15 characters
error-labels.error-invalidUsername-login: Username must contain only letters, numbers, points or dashes

confirmation-modal.title: Sell special card
confirmation-modal.description: Are you sure you want to sell this special card for ¢{{price}}? There is no way to undo this action.

mods.title: Select the Jokers of Neon version you want to play

confirmation-modal.title: Sell powerup
confirmation-modal.description: Are you sure you want to sell this Power-up for ¢{{price}}? There is no way to undo this action.

profile-menu.no-profile: Please login to see your profile

my-collection.title: Collection
my-collection.no-collection: Please login to see your collection
